articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Minor league goalie misses NHL call-up after losing passport
articles.description: Penguins minor league goalie missed a chance to join the team in Montreal.
articles.content:
MONTREAL -- 
Pittsburgh Penguins minor league goalie Casey DeSmith missed a chance to join the NHL team in Montreal on Saturday because he lost his passport.
The Penguins wanted to promote DeSmith from the AHL's Wilkes-Barre/Scranton for Saturday's game aga… [+683 chars]

articles.title: McGowan and Arquette reflect as Weinstein trial approaches

articles.content:

articles.title: Bill O'Reilly guest spot on TV show not apart of Discovery
articles.description: The Discovery Channel says a television show featuring Bill O’Reilly is not an official program on their network after receiving backlash for the former Fox News host's appearance on the show amid sexual harassment allegations against him
articles.content:

articles.title: Cooler weather brings respite in Australian wildfire crisis
articles.description: Milder temperatures are bringing hope of a respite from wildfires that have ravaged three Australian states, claiming 24 lives and destroying almost 2,000 homes
articles.content:
SYDNEY -- 
Milder temperatures Sunday brought hope of a respite from wildfires that have ravaged three Australian states, claiming 24 lives and destroying almost 2,000 homes.
